üìã Quick Setup (3 steps):

1Ô∏è‚É£ Database Setup
   ‚Ä¢ Open your Supabase dashboard
   ‚Ä¢ Go to SQL Editor
   ‚Ä¢ Run: migrations/supabase/supachat-schema.sql

2Ô∏è‚É£ Environment Configuration
   ‚Ä¢ Create .env.local in your project root
   ‚Ä¢ Add your Supabase keys:
     NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL=your_url
     NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=your_key

3Ô∏è‚É£ Component Integration
   ‚Ä¢ Add <ChatWidget /> to your layout
   ‚Ä¢ Create admin page with <AdminPanel />
   ‚Ä¢ Middleware auto-protects admin routes
